name: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationExtensionContext
desc: An object that you interact with to change an account’s password or to upgrade to Sign in with Apple.

items.name: func completeUpgradeToSignInWithApple(userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Completes the process of upgrading an account’s authentication credentials from using passwords to using Sign in with Apple.

items.name: func completeChangePasswordRequest(updatedCredential: ASPasswordCredential, userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Completes a request to update an account’s authentication credentials from using a weak password to using a strong password.

items.name: func getSignInWithAppleUpgradeAuthorization(state: String?, nonce: String?, completionHandler: (ASAuthorizationAppleIDCredential?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the user’s current Sign in with Apple authorization credentials.

items.name: func cancelRequest(withError: Error)
items.desc: Cancels a request with an error.

items.name: let ASExtensionLocalizedFailureReasonErrorKey: String
items.desc: A key that specifies a string value to show to the user when a request fails.
